doc:
Nia Vardalos https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nia_Vardalos 0 Antonia Eugenia "Nia" Vardalos (born September 24, 1962; Greek: Νία Βαρντάλος) is a Canadian-American actress, screenwriter, and producer of Greek descent. Her most notable work is the 2002 film My Big Fat Greek Wedding, which was based on a one-woman stage play she dramatized and in which she starred. Antonia_Eugenia_"_Nia_"_Vardalos ( born September_24_,_1962 ; Greek : Νία_Βαρντάλος ) is a_Canadian-American_actress , screenwriter , and producer of Greek_descent . Her_most_notable_work is the_2002_film My_Big_Fat_Greek_Wedding , which was_based on a_one-woman_stage_play she dramatized and in which she starred .
